summary: This is a brief email exchange discussing the collection of Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices by the FBI. The sender indicates progress is being made, with plans to pick up about three dozen devices that day and the remainder promised within 7-10 days.

events.title: Collection of Epstein Electronics
events.description: The FBI is making progress in collecting Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices, with plans to pick up about three dozen devices on this date and the balance promised within 7-10 days.

keyFacts: The FBI was in the process of collecting Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices as of July 2020.
Approximately three dozen devices were planned to be picked up on July 7, 2020.
The remaining devices were promised to be collected within 7-10 days from that date.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein's case after his death.
